description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 22 (Backup Generator Annual Emission Caps), 23 (Emission Reduction and Management Plan), 24 (Emissions Monitoring Plan) and 25 (Selective Catalytic Reduction) as attached to planning permission ref. 75111/APP/2022/1007 dated 21-09-2021 (Full planning permission for site clearance and preparation, including the demolition of remaining buildings, and the redevelopment of the site to provide three energy centres, two visitor reception centres, a new footpath and cycleway link to the canal towpath, works to the highway, car parking, cycle parking, associated infrastructure, enclosures and necessary physical security systems, hard and soft landscaping, and ancillary uses, as well as associated external works).
site_name: Land at Bulls Bridge Industrial Estate
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that Conditions 22 (Backup Generator Annual Emission Caps), 23 (Emission Reduction and Management Plan), 24 (Emissions Monitoring Plan) and 25 (Selective Catalytic Reduction) as attached to planning permission ref. 75111/APP/2022/1007 are fully discharged on the basis that all the 42 no. generators are identical. Should any of the generators used not be identical to those detailed under the documents hereby approved, a further application submission would be needed to re-discharge these conditions.
